news_items.content: Here is the rewritten list of news articles with a focus on removing duplicates and maintaining clarity:
1. Custody death: 6 cops suspended, Opposition slams government; CM writes to MEA after SL navy arrests 8 TN fishers.
2. Chennai's government forms rehabilitation and resettlement package for displaced families.
3. Two children drown in a small lake in Chennai.
4. Chennai College Students Drown In Coimbatore River; One Kg Cocaine Seized In Chennai, Eight Arrested.
5. Central armed forces hold mock drill near Chennai after Ahmedabad plane crash.
6. Cyber crooks cheat Chennai man of Rs 2.26 crore in fake share trading.
7. Women-led development paving way for new India: PM Modi at Mann Ki Baat.
- CCTV camera captures accused dragging Kolkata gangrape survivor inside college.
- Defence attache says jets lost to Pak due to constraints.
- SBI readies introduction of revamped digi platform; Tata Steel gets Rs 1k-cr input tax credit notice; Trade talks gather pace in US.
9. Nvidia reclaims title of most valuable company on AI momentum.
10. Artificial Intelligence: June 26, 2025 - How 'Zuck Bucks' shake up AI race; Pearson and Google team up to bring AI learning tools to classrooms.
I removed duplicates while keeping the original information intact.
